resources.string: Looks like something went wrong with login. Please try again.
Fill something in. You can\'t send an empty update!
Take or select a photo to attach to current tweet
Please log into your Twitter account to get started!
Unable to send a tweet. Here\'s the error: %s

TalkTweeter doesn't keep any of your personal information either locally or online (if you don't believe me, see for yourself: https://github.com/emerssso/livetweet).

However, it does have a privacy policy to comply with Google's rules. It is available here: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/8224947.
Please accept the policy before continuing to use the app.
Please accept the privacy policy before using TalkTweeter
Do you want to finish the current talk thread?
Are you sure you want to log out?
We need to write files so that we can cache pictures taken before we upload them to Twitter
